name: Liveware Glitch
description:
PARKOUR THROUGH A FLYING CYBERPUNK CITY RAN BY INSANE AI'S!

LIVEWARE GLITCH is a singleplayer, third-person 3D action platformer in which you play as Ika, your way through a futuristic cyberpunk city in the sky.

  • Fluid Parkour Movement System!
  • Mechanics like Wall Runs, Dashes & Slides!
  • Linear Level Design with Obstacles & Platforms!
  • Unique, Immersive World of Olympia!

In a distant future, society’s most powerful cities have been taken to the sky as technology riddled, flying metropolises. One of these cities is OLYMPIA, a powerful cosmopolis ruled by various mega-corporations and managed by super advanced Artificial Intelligences that keep the various systems and essential functions of the city running.

One of the inhabitants of Olympia is IKA, a low-class citizen, that spends her day ambushing and robbing various delivery drones around the poorer sections of the city. One day, during one of her robberies, she attacks a drone that was containing a rogue AI. Unbeknownst to her, this AI disrupts the systems of the city, driving the regent AIs to overwrite their previous code and go haywire. The city plunges into chaos, as each AI sieges control of a different district of Olympia and starts fighting for power over the whole metropolis.

Amidst the havoc, the rogue AI, named BO-X, contacts Ika and, in the pretext of restoring the city back to order, enlists her help so that together, they can restrain the deranged AIs. For this, she must carry the chip containing BO-X to the various headquarters of the AIs in order for it to hack them. With her agility and free running skills, Ika must face the powerful Ais has they throw at her every sort of obstacle they can.

Created and developed by Tydwave Interactive.
